name: http-hello-world
description: A minimal WebAssembly component that responds to HTTP requests with a hello world message

scripts.generate:types: rimraf generated/types && jco types wit/ -o generated/types
scripts.setup:wit: [ -d wit/deps ] || (npm run fetch:wit && npm run generate:types)
scripts.build: npm run setup:wit && npm run build:ts && npm run build:component
